typeDescription.name: com.dalelane.uima.bluemixhelloworld.annotations.LongWord
typeDescription.description: An annotation applied to long words found in the provided text, where any word over seven letters long is considered long.

featureDescription.name: length
featureDescription.description: The number of characters in the word

typeDescription.name: com.dalelane.uima.bluemixhelloworld.annotations.Email
typeDescription.description: An annotation applied to strings that look like valid email addresses.

featureDescription.name: host
featureDescription.description: The hostname for the email address

featureDescription.name: user
featureDescription.description: The username for the email address

typeDescription.name: com.dalelane.uima.bluemixhelloworld.annotations.CapitalisedWord
typeDescription.description: An annotation applied to strings that are made up of a capital letter followed by one or more lower-case letters.
